about_the_game:
Now you can enjoy the songs from the game “Geometric Sniper – Blood in Paris” on your computer at any time.

Perfect for studying, working or just relaxing. Listen directly from your Steam client.

Includes all the original songs from GEOMETRIC SNIPER – BLOOD IN PARIS, specially composed for the game by Caue Lemes, member of the band DONGO DONGO, in 320 kbps MP3 format.

Now you can enjoy the songs from the game “Geometric Sniper – Blood in Paris” on your computer at any time.

Perfect for studying, working or just relaxing. Listen directly from your Steam client.

The songs can be directly accessed through the Steam platform or by following the steps below:
... or in the Geometric Sniper – Blood in Paris Soundtrack folder in the Steam directory: ... \ Steam \ steamapps \ music \ Geometric Sniper – Blood in Paris Soundtrack.
